brainly_data.question:
Which of the following is an example of groupthink? 

A. The principal and his boss deciding to change the school schedule without any other input 

B. The club that decides to have a clothing drive 

C. The church group that decides to go to Mexico to help build houses 

D. The group of friends who decide to go camping together
brainly_data.subject: Physics

all_answers.question:
Which of the following is an example of groupthink? 

A. The principal and his boss deciding to change the school schedule without any other input 

B. The club that decides to have a clothing drive 

C. The church group that decides to go to Mexico to help build houses 

D. The group of friends who decide to go camping together
all_answers.subject: Physics
all_answers.text:
B is most likely the answer.

Hope this Helped!

;D
